data.name: Autopsy Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Check out those cool games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1063980/Hell_Architect/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1111840/Urban_Explorer/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159390/Taxi_Simulator/



Autopsy Simulator features a free play ‘Autopsy Only’ mode and ‘Autopsy Simulator: Dead Memories’, a self-contained, narrative-driven psychological horror experience set in 1990s New Orleans.

In Autopsy Simulator: Dead Memories, you play a middle-aged pathologist whose life has taken a turn for the worse. After a career downfall and the loss of your beloved wife, you live each day shattered and exhausted. One day during a routine post-mortem, you find a relic of your past hidden inside a body. Now, it feels like something just won’t let go…

FEATURES

Examine the bodies and study the files to get all the answers
Every case has its own story and each victim has their secrets. Uncover them to solve the puzzles and learn the truth about your subjects... and yourself.



Cases prepared and analyzed by specialists
Each case is designed with the help of real life pathomorphologists and forensic doctors, ensuring the feel of being involved in an authentic autopsy process. Down to even the most gruesome details.



Detailed depiction of organs and autopsy cases
In-game bodies, organs and injuries are crafted with unprecedented attention to detail. While this makes it easy to create immersion, it's also not for the faint hearted.



A unique mix of simulation and horror
A combination of engrossing gameplay mechanics and spine-chilling moments will keep you on your toes throughout all of the story's chapters.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Autopsy Simulator is a first-person horror-sim hybrid where players take on the role of a practice pathologist and study case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic doctors, to help guide their dissection of anatomically accurate bodies to determine each subject’s cause of death.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 / Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core / Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD GPU Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Criminal cases, dead bodies and nudity
